plot outline: 'Ninaivugal Unnodu' is a bittersweet romantic tale that is primarily catered towards rural mass audiences. This emotionally charged drama revolves around the blossoming of love between a young couple and their struggles to stay together and unite in the bond of matrimony, despite violent opposition from those around them. While liberally spiced with all the commercial elements of cinema like romance, drama, music, dance and comedy, the movie also has a positive social message, exploring Tamil cultural idiosyncrasies and superstitions, especially the treatment of women in this patriarchal society.
